messages.title: My name is Andy Livsey. I’m standing with Theresa May. This is our Plan:
At this election, your vote can make a difference:
messages.content: I'm not a career politician; I'm a dad of four who has lived in the real world. I worked as a builder and, last year, I helped out in the Vote Leave campaign. I'm Theresa May’s candidate in the Wallasey Constituency and will make it here if elected.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will recruit up to 10,000 more mental health professionals, expand cancer screening and upgrade radiotherapy equipment to ensure more people survive cancer.
We will expand apprenticeship and training schemes and continue with the National Living Wage.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Enabling all children to reach their full potential
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will make sure that all children can go as far as their talents take them.
We will keep our promise to maintain the Triple Lock until 2020 and then introduce a new Double Lock.
We need a proper system to assess how much you pay for it and we want people to have certainty about what they can own and pass on to loved ones.
We will change the law to accommodate more child refugees and improve the coordination of services.
I am determined to get the best deal for Britain from the European Union and work with Theresa May to make sure this happens.
We will introduce the banning of the export of live animals for slaughter.

issues.brexitEurope: Making a success of Brexit: I campaigned for Vote Leave and I will work with Theresa May to make a success of Brexit.
issues.economy: Creating jobs, increasing pay: We will expand apprenticeship and training schemes and continue with the National Living Wage.
issues.education: Enabling all children to reach their full potential: We will make sure that all children can go as far as their talents take them.
issues.health: Investing in our NHS: We will recruit up to 10,000 more mental health professionals, expand cancer screening and upgrade radiotherapy equipment to ensure more people survive cancer.
issues.labourEmployment: Creating jobs, increasing pay: We will expand apprenticeship and training schemes and continue with the National Living Wage.
issues.socialWelfare: Pensions: We will keep our promise to maintain the Triple Lock until 2020 and then introduce a new Double Lock.

community.content: Val Frost is a Senior Critical Care Nurse in Wirral's NHS: We need an MP who will ensure the NHS locally gets a fair share of the extra £8 billion that has been announced.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm Theresa May’s candidate in the Wallasey Constituency and will make it here if elected.

endorsements.endorsement: Fed up with the scare stories from Labour, the Lib Dems and other parties about Theresa May’s plan. All they are doing is using the NHS as a weapon in their campaign - divide and conquer. It’s the same at every election.

examples: We will recruit up to 10,000 more mental health professionals

Theresa May’s Plan will ensure this.

Val Frost: Fed up with the scare stories from Labour, the Lib Dems and other parties about Theresa May’s plan. All they are doing is using the NHS as a weapon in their campaign - divide and conquer. It’s the same at every election.
Fed up with the scare stories from Labour
Millions of Labour voters feel that Jeremy Corbyn’s Party no longer speaks for them.
